劈.definition: to split in two; to divide

劈叉.definition: the splits (move in dancing); to do the splits; Taiwan pr. [pi3 cha1]

劈啪.definition: (onom.) for crack, slap, clap, clatter etc

劈手.definition: with a lightning move of the hand

劈腿.definition: to do the splits (gymnastics); (Tw) two-timing (in romantic relationships); Taiwan pr. [pi1 tui3]

劈裂.definition: to split open; to cleave; to rend

劈開.definition: to cleave; to split open; to spread open (fingers, legs)

劈頭.definition: straight away; right off the bat; right on the head; right in the face

劈頭蓋臉.definition: lit. splitting the head and covering the face (idiom); fig. pelting (with rain etc); showering down
